summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Ave. Northeast from Northeast 92nd Street to Northeast 125th Street; by widening the existing paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19199 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
